song.englishname: How Can I Keep from Singing

english.segment1: There is an endless song. Echoes in my soul. I hear the music ring. And though storms may come. I am holding on. To the rock I cling
english.segment2: How can I keep from singing Your praise?. How can I ever say enough?. How amazing is Your love?. How can I keep from shouting Your name?. I know I am loved by the King. And it makes my heart want to sing
english.segment3: I will lift my eyes. In the darkest night. For I know my Savior lives. And I will walk with You. Knowing You see me through. And sing the songs You give
english.segment4: How can I keep from singing Your praise?. How can I ever say enough?. How amazing is Your love?. How can I keep from shouting Your name?. I know I am loved by the King. And it makes my heart want to sing
english.segment5: I can sing in the troubled times. Sing when I win. I can sing when I lose my step. And I fall down again
english.segment6: I can sing 'cause You pick me up. Sing 'cause You're there. I can sing 'cause You hear me, Lord. When I call to You in prayer
english.segment7: I can sing with my last breath. Sing for I know. That I'll sing with the angels. And the saints around the throne
english.segment8: How can I keep from singing Your praise?. How can I ever say enough?. How amazing is Your love?. How can I keep from shouting Your name?. I know I am loved by the King. And it makes my heart. I am loved by the King. And it makes my heart. I am loved by the King. And it makes my heart want to sing. I can sing
